page.title: 13EMPLOYMENT IN BIRCH
page.content: In a survey which we conducted in school we found that most fathers {worked}in Colchester because it is fairly close to Birch and there is a bus service into town. The fathers who work in Birch work on the{farms. Several parents work for local building firms and at the sand pits in Stanway. Some small firms use the out buildings near Birch Hall. 12 fathers travelled more than 26k from Birch, some{commute}to London by train although some drive there. A{shopping centre has opened in Stanway. Over half the mothers worked, some part time. Most work locally so that they can be at home when their children come back from school. Many have no{transport}and the bus service is infrequent. A lot of mothers worked at home or in other peoples' houses in and around Birch.
